mapper.select: SELECT UPLOAD_NO, ID, UPLOAD_TITLE, UPLOAD_CONTENT, UPLOAD_HIT, UPLOAD_CREATE_DATE, UPLOAD_MODIFY_DATE, UPLOAD_IP FROM ANI_BRD_UD

SELECT A.RN, A.UPLOAD_NO, A.ID, A.UPLOAD_TITLE, A.UPLOAD_CONTENT, A.UPLOAD_HIT, A.UPLOAD_CREATE_DATE, A.UPLOAD_MODIFY_DATE, A.UPLOAD_IP FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY UPLOAD_NO DESC) AS RN, UPLOAD_NO, ID, UPLOAD_TITLE, UPLOAD_CONTENT, UPLOAD_HIT, UPLOAD_CREATE_DATE, UPLOAD_MODIFY_DATE, UPLOAD_IP FROM ANI_BRD_UD) A WHERE A.RN BETWEEN #{begin} AND #{end}
mapper.insert:
SELECT ANI_BRD_UD_SEQ.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO ANI_BRD_UD (UPLOAD_NO, ID, UPLOAD_TITLE, UPLOAD_CONTENT, UPLOAD_HIT, UPLOAD_CREATE_DATE, UPLOAD_MODIFY_DATE, UPLOAD_IP) VALUES (#{uploadNo}, #{id}, #{uploadTitle}, #{uploadContent}, 0, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, #{uploadIp})
INSERT INTO ANI_BRD_UD_ATTACH (ATTACH_NO, UPLOAD_NO, PATH, ORIGIN, FILESYSTEM, DOWNLOAD_CNT) VALUES (ANI_BRD_UD_ATTACH_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{uploadNo}, #{path}, #{origin}, #{filesystem}, 0)
